title: Teapot and Lid, from Child's Tea Set
description: London shape; base color is buff with puce transfers and trim with green rims; transfers include a lady in an Empire style dress with a child and a string instrument by a Greek chair; a lady and child playing a harp; a man, woman and child sitting; and a woman on a couch with two children
creditline: The Mrs. Aall's Porcelain Collection Fund
